video.title: Red vs. Blue
video.synopsis: This parody of first-person shooter games, military life and science-fiction films centers on a civil war fought in the middle of a desolate canyon.

seasons.title: Red vs. Blue: The Blood Gulch Chronicles

episodes.synopsis: In the distant future, 10 soldiers battle for control of the least desirable piece of land in the universe: a box canyon in the middle of nowhere.
episodes.title: Volume 1

episodes.synopsis: A medical officer arrives at a remote outpost to find his patients dead, a poltergeist haunting a robot and an evil strain of artificial intelligence.
episodes.title: Volume 2

episodes.synopsis: The universe is in chaos, and the final hope for humanity is 2,000 years in the past with a fast-talking computer that loves knock-knock jokes.
episodes.title: Volume 3

episodes.synopsis: A bomb with a bad attitude, an alien with an epic score to settle and the usual gang of hapless soldiers are on a quest to save the universe.
episodes.title: Volume 4

episodes.synopsis: "The Blood Gulch Chronicles" conclude with the usual gang of luckless troops, joined by a mysterious stranger, a half-alien child and a crashed ship.
episodes.title: Volume 5

episodes.synopsis: In Season 6, the Reds and the Blues join forces to help Agent Washington combat the enigmatic Meta and uncover a conspiracy behind Project Freelancer.
episodes.title: Volume 6

episodes.synopsis: In the seventh season of this action-comedy, the sole remaining Blue soldier, Caboose, goes on the offensive against the Reds.
episodes.title: Volume 7

episodes.synopsis: In Season 8, Agent Washington and the Meta take over the Blue base, and a group of desert-dwelling aliens cause Tucker some serious trouble.
episodes.title: Volume 8

episodes.synopsis: The ninth season details the early history of Project Freelancer and follows Epsilon-Church as he tries to change the history of Blood Gulch.
episodes.title: Volume 9

episodes.synopsis: Project Freelancer tries to defeat the Insurrection, and Agent Carolina attempts to hunt down and assassinate the Director.
episodes.title: Volume 10

episodes.synopsis: Season 11 finds the Reds and Blues once again stranded and squaring off in a remote canyon after their transport plane crashes.
episodes.title: Volume 11

episodes.synopsis: In Season 12, the remaining Reds and Blues become insurgents when they join in a rebellion against the army of a former colony named Chorus.
episodes.title: Volume 12
